#Objects

pa point
pb point
pc point
pd point
pe point

lab line
lac line
lbc line
lae line
lbe line 
lce line

ca circle
cb circle

#Relations

end_points(pa, pb, lab)
end_points(pa, pc, lac)
end_points(pb, pc, lbc)

end_points(pa, pe, lae)
end_points(pb, pe, lbe)
end_points(pc, pe, lce)

length_equal(lab, lac)
length_equal(lab, lbc)
length_equal(lac, lbc)

length_equal(lab, lae)
length_equal(lab, lbe)
length_equal(lae, lbe)

centre(pa, ca)
centre(pb, cb)

coincident(pc, ca)
coincident(pc, cb)
coincident(pe, ca)
coincident(pe, cb)
not_equal(pc, pe)

coincident(pd, lab)
coincident(pb, lce)
